    • Method Detail

      • isCenterLock

        public boolean isCenterLock()
        Check if the map is in center lock mode or not.
        Returns:
        true if map is in cencter lock mode.

      • setCenterLock

        public void setCenterLock(boolean lock)
        Set or unset center lock.
        Parameters:
        lock - set true to set center lock, false to release center lock.

      • setOnModeChangedCallback

        public void setOnModeChangedCallback(SAILSMapView.OnModeChangedCallback m)

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
        Get current mode setting.
        Returns:
        mode setting value.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int mode)
        Set mode to specify value.
        Parameters:
        mode - input mode value {LOCATION_CENTER_LOCK=1, FOLLOW_PHONE_HEADING =2, AUTO_FLOOR_SWITCH=4, ALWAYS_LOCK_MAP=8}

      • isInLocationFloor

        public boolean isInLocationFloor()
        Check if the locating floor recognized by SAILS engine is the same as the floor that user browsed currently.
        Returns:
        true if the floor in view is the same as the locating floor.

      • setLocationMarker

        public void setLocationMarker(int circle,
                     int arrow,
                     Paint accuracyCirclePaint,
                     int dps)
        Set location indicator icon. You can see the icon you set when the location engine turn on.
        Parameters:
        circle - set icon when location not fix.
        arrow - set icon when location is already fix.
        accuracyCirclePaint - set accuracy circle area show. set null if you don't need to show it.
        dps - set icon size.

      • setGoalMarker

        public void setGoalMarker(int drawable,
                 SAILS.GeoNode location)
        Set navigation destination indicator icon.
        Parameters:
        drawable - icon from android resource.
        location - destination location in GeoNode format.

      • setSAILSEngine

        public void setSAILSEngine(SAILS mS)
        Initialize location engine, must include when do initialization.
        Parameters:
        mS - SAILS object.

      • setLocatorMarkerVisible

        public void setLocatorMarkerVisible(boolean visible)
        Set location marker visible or invisible.
        Parameters:
        visible - true for visible, false for invisible.

      • setGoalMarkerVisible

        public void setGoalMarkerVisible(boolean visible)

        Parameters:
        visible - true for visible, false for invisible.
